data.name: VoxVR
data.detailed_description:
VoxVR is a creative tool that lets you create 3D models using small blocks in virtual reality.


This application allows you to create voxel art in an intuitive and easy way. It is really fun to stand in your own creation while creating it. You are also able to import existing voxel files to view them from a whole new perspective. This software is made for both: artists and gamer's, because you can export your work to common voxel file formats as well as optimized mesh files but it is also great fun to create buildings, characters, etc. in VR.

Please keep in mind, that VoxVR is still in early access. To see with features are already implemented and which are planned, head over to our Roadmap.



For Gamers

Build everything you can imagine. From characters and pixel-art to vehicles and buildings. It is a lot easier and so much more fun to build 3D objects in 3D space than on a 2D screen.
Share your creations with others in our VoxVR Subreddit!



For Artists

VoxVR ist perfect for voxel artists because of the physical environment, that lets you place voxels precisely and fast, in combination with our on productivity optimized tools. We also want to offer you as much compatibility to traditional programs as possible. That is why we already have support for Magica Voxel (.vox), Qubicle (.qb) and an export option for 3D formats like FBX (.fbx) or Collada (.dae).
We are working on several systems, which will make it even easier to create complex voxel structures, like brushes, copy & paste-, select- and move- tools.



Links

VoxVR Website & Dev-blog
VoxVR Subreddit
Press Kit
Developer Website
Facebook
Instagram
Google+

data.short_description:
VoxVR is a creative tool to create awesome 3D-models and voxel-art.
Its a lot easier and more fun to build 3D objects in 3D space than on a 2D screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need an HTC Vive or Oculus Rift + Touch!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need an HTC Vive or Oculus Rift + Touch!
